thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 10
thread.title: Veronika

author: Veronika
title: Veronika
text: I have travelled with Intrepid 4 times to different countries, and every time the experience was amazing, the itineraries are thoroughly planned and organised. Every trip is crafted and tailored to your needs and provides unforgettable experience, it is a combination of discovering culture, nature and uniqueness of the local people. I highly recommend Intrepid to anyone, who just starts travelling to the most experienced traveller. You will enjoy it!
